identity.name: Clinical Swiss
identity.core_concept: Trust through Clarity. A sterile but human interface that reduces anxiety through precision and calm.

primary.description: Medical Sky Blue - Friendly but professional. Use for primary actions.

secondary.description: Slate 100 - Use for secondary buttons and backgrounds.

rules: Ensure 4.5:1 contrast ratio for normal text.
All interactive elements must have :focus-visible styles.
Use aria-live='polite' for queue status updates.

instructions_to_main_agent.general: Follow the 'Clinical Swiss' identity. Prioritize clarity and trust. Do not use gradients for text. Use the provided image URLs for placeholders.
instructions_to_main_agent.layout: Use the 'Bento' grid for the Doctor Dashboard. Use a focused, single-card layout for the Patient Consultation view.
instructions_to_main_agent.real_time: Implement Socket.IO for real-time queue updates and call invitations. Ensure the 'Loud' notification triggers the audio chime.
instructions_to_main_agent.video: Use PeerJS for WebRTC. Ensure the video container handles aspect ratios correctly (cover vs contain).
instructions_to_main_agent.packages: Install 'framer-motion' for animations. Install 'socket.io-client' and 'peerjs' if not present.

do_not: Do not use 'Inter' for headings (use Plus Jakarta Sans).
Do not use dark mode by default (Medical = Light/Clean).
Do not clutter the video call interface.
must_do: Ensure mobile responsiveness for all views.
